title: PM Shehbaz proposes committee to resolve political issues
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday met with Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam-Fazl (JUI-F) Chief Maulana Fazlur Rehman wherein he proposed the formation of a committee to collaboratively address the prevailing political issues.
The prime minister suggested this while visiting Maulana Fazl ur Rehman’s residence to inquire after his well-being.
Maulana Fazl welcomed the prime minister, who appreciated the JUI-F chief’s religious services and his continuous support to peaceful struggle for protection of democratic values.
